duties_responsibilities.duty: Presents news stories and other content for all platforms, ensuring they meet company standards for journalistic integrity and production quality.
Produces newscasts and communicates clear direction with team members.
Acts as a field reporter, conducts interviews, and responds to breaking news and other urgent newsroom situations.
Writes and delivers news stories in a clear, concise manner, and participates in promotional activities including public appearances.
Writes content for the website and other eMedia platforms, interacts with viewers/users on social media sites.
Assists in writing, copy editing, researching, and coordinating news programming and other content.
Edits video clips and performs special projects and other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Broadcast Journalism or a related field (Master's preferred)
